version_description:
- Added percentages in piechart for color blind
- Fixed issue where favorites would still appear in full list
- Favorites are now reloaded automatically when they are changed

- several bug fixes and compatibility upgrades
- remove advertising from the app (premium feature)

- add support for iOS 10
- bug fixes

- Add support for iOS 10
- Bug fixes
Fix a bug that caused the app to crash on iPad when reporting a problem

- add support for Norway, Finland, Chile, Argentina, Hong Kong, United Arab Emirates
- add support for Danish, Finish, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish
- compatibility update and bug fixes
upgrade in-app purchases to auto renewing subsciptions

- Introducing a new design and user interface
- New, easier to use privacy management
- Introducing a new Enterprise section for Downdetector Services clients with advanced analytics and custom push notifications
- Adding support for new countries: Czechia, Colombia, Croatia, Ecuador, Greece, Hungary, Indonesia, Malaysia, Pakistan, Philippines, Romania, Slovakia
- Adding support for new languages: Czech, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Malay, Romanian, Slovak

- Introducing a new design and user interface
- New, easier to use privacy management
- Introducing a new Enterprise section for Downdetector Services clients with advanced analytics and custom push notifications
- Adding support for new countries: Czechia, Colombia, Croatia, Ecuador, Greece, Hungary, Indonesia, Malaysia, Pakistan, Philippines, Romania, Slovakia
- Adding support for new languages: Czech, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Malay, Romanian, Slovak

Bug fixes including:
- Better display tooltip in outage chart
- Fix issue where Dashboard users in some cases were logged out.

- add option to sort company by alphabet
- usability improvements and bug fixes
